resources.string:
The license information cached from Android Market has expired. The License Checker could not retrieve a valid license response.
There might be a problem with your connection to the Android Market.
Please make sure your Internet connection is active/working and press "Retry".
For further information visit http://gradlspace.com/cys/faq
SleepMode enabled. Just place the handheld on the bed now. Good night!
Time window for alarms to pre-fire before actual alarm time [in minutes].
Think of a short Theme / Headline describing the Dream

Welcome to the Calibration Utility! This tool will help you to find a good place for the handheld on your bed and ensure the functionality of the detector. You may press Back at any time to exit the calibration utility.

After pressing \"Go!\", place your handheld onto your bed and tuck yourself in. You will hear a sound every time you move enough for the sensors to recognize your movement. Try turning around in your bed and listen for the event sound. If you don\'t hear a sound even while moving heavily, you have to find another place for the handheld. Try experimenting with various positions to find one where you can hear the trigger sound during movements but not while you lie still. In most cases the best position is under your pillow.
Movement detected. Suggested Threshold Multiplier: %1$.2f\nClick Save to set the suggested value and finish calibration.

No peak could be detected. Probably the place you chose for the handheld is not suitable. Make sure that you place it in such a way that your movements can be detected by the handheld\'s motion sensor.
Go to Menu > Options for customization.
\"Back\" will apply all changes. To cancel, click the button at the bottom.
Long-press an item to show the context menu.
(use the input boxes or the slider)
Really reset all preferences to their default values?
Do you want to quit? This will cancel all active alarms and timers!\nPress Close if you just want to exit the program but keep the alarms active.
You can only activate SleepMode if there is at least one Alarm enabled.
Purge all files or just the outdated ones?
You may use gestures to navigate the views. Press the \"Back\" button on your handheld to exit the viewer.

Select an alarm time by dragging the bar in the middle of the screen. Then press \"Set\" to activate the alarm. Afterwards press \"Go to Bed!\", put your handheld under your pillow and start sleeping.
Please remember to turn on your wLAN or packet radio service before starting the SleepMode! It will be reactivated during the alarm to download the stream.
Press alarm text to change settings.
Really stop the monitor? The alarm will not be triggered by sleep phase then!
The monitor tracks your movements during the night. If you close it, the alarm can not be triggered by your sleep phase.

Please press the Report button to review and send an autogenerated error report via email to us. We will then contact you as soon as possible.\nYou may also contact our support directly via support@gradlspace.com.
Error! Not enough free space available on the filesystem!
Error playing media. Couldn\'t access file/stream or invalid format.

The application encountered an error.

Press the "Report" button to send an error report containing the text shown in the "Details" view.

Press "Ok" to close this window. Depending on the severity of the error the Application may be closed as well. In that case you can just restart it.
Low battery! Monitoring has been stopped. Always make sure that your battery-level is high enough before going to sleep.
Battery temperature critical! Monitoring has been stopped. Please contact the support.

Couldn\'t acquire wakelock. This could be caused by a known bug in several firmware versions of a bunch of handheld vendors. Please try to update to the latest firmware. If it is still not working, contact our support at support@gradlspace.com

The firmware on your device contains a severe bug that prevents normal operation of Cyclosleep.
There are several options to handle this issue:

1. Check for the latest firmware for your device. The bug was fixed in all Android versions above 2.3.3.

2. Try to activate one of the Bug-Workaround options. See the FAQ for further information.

3. Activate the SimpleMode not using any sleep stage detection.

4. If you don't know what a bug or a firmware is, and have no interest in learning about those things, please consider uninstalling Cyclosleep to prevent bad user-experience :-(

By clicking the "Accept" button, you agree that you have read, understood and accept all the terms and conditions in the License Agreement, found at
http://gradlspace.com/cys/eula

In particular, you accept and agree that the authors of this software can, under no circumstances whatsoever, be held accountable in any way for damage caused to your device running this program. Although very unlikely, it can not be ruled out that you damage your device unintentionally while sleeping. Recommendations to reduce that risk are given during the introduction on the next screen and on the web at
http://gradlspace.com/cys/safety

Since this program is part of an ongoing research project at the University of Erlangen-Nuremberg and the University Hospital Erlangen, it might be possible that you get asked about voluntarily participating in academic studies/surveys by submitting nonpersonal information. Further details will be supplied in those particular cases. Rest assured that no data directly processed by our program-packages will ever be submitted, gathered or retrieved without you opting in on a case-by-case basis.
If you do not ever wish to participate or support the related scientific research, you can deactivate the entire module in the options-screen.

This app is part of a research project at the University of Erlangen-Nuremberg and the Sleep Laboratory of the University Hospital Erlangen.\n Therefore you may support the research at any time by submitting anonymous sleep statistics. To do that, just open the Viewer and select \"Upload to FAU DB\".\n

Quickstart

In the main screen, enter the time when you wish to wake up, either by dragging the slider or entering the time directly into the text field.

Then, press "Set", "Go to bed" and put your phone somewhere in your bed. Preferably under your pillow or somewhere near it (see picture below).

Make sure it is secured somehow, e.g. place it under your bed sheet. Only turn off the screen, not the phone!

Cyclosleep will wake you up at the set time at the latest. Depending on your settings there is a given time window of 10-50 minutes in which Cyclosleep will also trigger the alarm in advance depending on your sleep phase. Please tune this time window depending on your experience with it and your sleeping habits.
The threshold values are calibrated automatically by Cyclosleep over the course of three to seven days. So please be patient if you are woken up a bit early in the first two days.

Welcome to Cyclosleep.

Since this seems to be the first time you start this App, we would like to introduce you to the basic usage of this program.

If you are already familiar with it you may press your handheld's back-button.

Go to the options menu to customize the behavior of the app.
We recommend visiting the website and reading the online manual for more detailed instructions and explanations.

http://gradlspace.com/cys

 There you will also find additional information about the associated research projects at the University Erlangen-Nuremberg and how you may support them.
We will now test your device\'s accelerometer. On several older phones accelerometer readings can\'t be acquired when the device display is off which would break the functionality of Cyclosleep.
Advanced settings for alarms, events and responses.
The timeout for all alarm sounds/effects.
If activated, the alarm sounds are played even if the phone is in silent mode.
Play a more annoying sound in the last quarter of the timeout if the alarm isn\'t committed.
Additional action that has to be performed before the alarm is committed.
Configure options to help remember your dreams.
Ask about dreams after alarm dialog was dismissed.
Tries to wake you in REM phases. CAUTION: use carefully, this will disturb your sleep!
Use and configure social network integration.
Show additional actions for mailing dreams and hypnograms.
Enables you to rate your sleep after dismissing the alarm.
Each time the alarm is triggered a random sound file on your device is used.
Play your favorite Internet radio station as alarm sound.
This uses the time of the sunrise as alarm time.
Activate this to prevent alarms from going off twice. (1. sleep stage induced & 2. on the set time)
Threshold value for movement recognition [12-500 int]
Deactivates the automatic adjustment of threshold values. Enables manual override.
Retry timeout for reaching a stream server for audio playback [seconds].
Use Android\'s Text-To-Speech engine for announcements.
Initialize TTS Engine and check data availability.
Regularly tells you what time it is during an alarm.
Regularly reads you the message you set for the alarm.
At what interval the announces should be made during an alarm [in minutes].
Activate Airplane Mode during SleepMode, disabling all radios in the device.
Action to perform when activating SleepMode.
Deactivates automatic screen orientation changes while monitoring. (Recommended)
Select a work-around for the famous sensor-tracking bug. (see FAQ!)
Write all collected data to disk. If this is deactivated you can only view live reports.
Automatically prune data storage, deleting old or empty data files.
Enter a directory if you don\'t want to use the default (sdcard).
Expiration time, in days, for data files.
If this is enabled you will never be asked about supporting academic research.
Compress raw data files. Before sending them and local files after 7 days.
Include hypnogram files when auto-purging data files.
Include dream files when auto-purging data files.
Shows a QuickTimer on the main screen for simple timing. (Requires restart)
Keep a persistent icon in the notification area while triggers are active.
Deactivates most tracking mechanics making this a simple - only time based - alarm clock.
Use this Activity to find a good spot for your handheld on the bed.
CAUTION: Be very careful changing these settings. They directly affect core mechanics of the alarm and detection components.
Time window in which alarms are allowed to pre-fire [in minutes]
Reset all custom preferences to their factory-default values.
Show option to send crash/error reports via mail.

Testing Sensor/Screen interaction...
Do not close or exit this activity until it finished!

Please turn off your device display by pressing the respective HARDWARE-button or just wait for it to be turned off automatically.

Wait 2 seconds and turn it on again.

Test FAILED. 
 
Unfortunately, your phone is not capable of providing sensor data while the screen is turned off. 

Cyclosleep will NOT be able to work correctly! 

Please read http://gradlspace.com/cys/fwbug for further information. 
You may press Next to try a work-around.

Test PASSED. 
 
Everything is fine. Your Sensor is capable of providing data while the screen is turned off. 
Click Finish to close the Test-Activity.

As detailed on http://gradlspace.com/cys/fwbug we will now try a work-around. 
If this isn't working as well, you will not be able to use Cyclosleep's sleep tracking functions. 
It is up to you to decide whether you would like to use the program without sleep tracking. However we recommend that you uninstall the App to avoid bad user experience. 
You may also contact the support for further inquiries. Go to Menu-About-Contact Support. 
 
Please turn off the screen now with the hardware-button and wait a few seconds. The screen should turn on automatically again if the work-around is successful.

Test FAILED. 
 
The work-around was not successful. 
Cyclosleep will not work correctly. :-(

Test PASSED. 
 
The work-around seems to work. 
The downside is that your display has to be active while tracking. 
You either have to connect the power-cable all night, or expect serious battery drainage.

By clicking "Upload", you agree that anonymized sleep data from your device is uploaded to the database servers of the University Erlangen (FAU). You accept and agree to the terms and conditions given here for uploading statistical data. 
 
All data uploaded will only be used for scientific purposes. 
To provide additional safety the datafile will be attached to an email which you have to send manually to complete the upload process.
Really delete the sleep record and all associated data/dream files?
